summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements (REQ-32 through REQ-38) with generally solid coverage. REQ-32 (Service Manager), REQ-33 (Review Approver), REQ-34 (Glassmorphism), REQ-35 (Scroll Progress Bar), REQ-36 (Floating Dental Elements), and REQ-37 (Magnetic Cursor) all have corresponding implementation. REQ-38 (static PNG assets in frontend/public/assets/generated) is referenced by components but the actual PNG files are not present in the diff as added files. One notable gap: REQ-33 requires showing the submission date in the Review Approver panel, which is not visible in the ReviewApprover component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin panel Review Approver section must display submission date alongside patient name, review text, and star rating for each pending review.
missing_requirements.reason: The ReviewApprover.tsx component renders reviewerName, text, and rating but there is no submission date field displayed. The Review type in backend/main.mo also does not appear to include a submittedAt/date field, and neither the backend nor frontend surface a submission date.

missing_requirements.requirement: All floating dental element PNG files must be present as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 6 added files, none of which are PNG image assets. The FloatingDentalElements component references tooth-float-icon.dim_96x96.png, dental-mirror-float-icon.dim_96x96.png, toothbrush-float-icon.dim_96x96.png, and plus-float-icon.dim_96x96.png, but no binary or image files appear in the added files list.

hallucinated_features.description: A backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added as a separate file using a module pattern with OldActor/NewActor migration types and a run function.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a migration module or migration pattern. It only requires that all Motoko logic remain in the single backend/main.mo actor. The migration.mo is a new separate file not requested by any requirement.
